definition: disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence
limited term of imprisonment (i.e. anything less than life imprisonment)

sentences.english: His punishment of death was commuted to life imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 他被从死刑减为无期徒刑。

sentences.english: His actions led to a death sentence, which was later commuted to a prison term.
sentences.chinese: 郗浩良的行动导致被判处死刑，后来减为有期徒刑。

sentences.english: In Gambia 11 journalists have been jailed for extended periods in 2006.
sentences.chinese: 在冈比亚，11名记者在2006年被判长期徒刑。

sentences.english: He has said she faces a possible life sentence.
sentences.chinese: 维曾表示，田文华可能会被判无期徒刑。

sentences.english: Damaging the wall carries a penalty of up to ten years in prison, or a fine of 500, 000 yuan (Pounds44, 000).
sentences.chinese: 破坏长城最多可判十年徒刑，或者50万元返款。

sentences.english: Typically gw gold, such sentences are commuted to life in prison.
sentences.chinese: 通常情况下，这种判决都会减刑为无期徒刑。

sentences.english: Jean got life imprisonment for killing the policeman.
sentences.chinese: 简因杀害那个警察被判处无期徒刑。

sentences.english: Also in mock trials judges give longer prison sentences to ugly people.
sentences.chinese: 在模拟审判中，法官会判丑的犯人更长的徒刑。

sentences.english: The court doomed the accused to life imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判决被告无期徒刑。

sentences.english: His punishment was commuted from life imprisonment to twenty-five years' imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 他的无期徒刑减轻为二十五年徒刑。

sentences.english: His punishment was commuted from life imprisonment to twenty-five years' imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 他的无期徒刑减轻为二十五年徒刑。

sentences.english: The man, according to the police, has since been given a 12-year sentence.
sentences.chinese: 据警方消息，这人被判了12年徒刑。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court automatically reviews life imprisonment and death sentences.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院自动审查无期徒刑和死刑。

sentences.english: Prosecutors had asked for a 40-year sentence.
sentences.chinese: 检察官要求判处他40年徒刑。

sentences.english: If the circumstances are especially serious, the offender shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than ten years.
sentences.chinese: 情节特别严重的，处十年以上有期徒刑。

sentences.english: If convicted, the violation carries a one-year jail sentence.
sentences.chinese: 若是判罪，则该人将判处一年徒刑。

definition: limited term of imprisonment (i.e. anything less than life imprisonment)
to imprison/to jail/to take into custody
deferred death sentence/commuted death sentence with forced labor and judicial review after two years (PRC) (legal)
to defer/to put off (until later)/to postpone
